column5: This room is a two person bedroom with a full size bed available. There is a television but no cable but wi fi is provided. The room has a lock to provide privacy. It is next to the bathroom which will have towels and other toiletries that might be needed. You will have access to the kitchen which will have a some breakfast items provided. You will have access to the home through the front door and also the garage which will be available for you to park your vehicle (peace of mind amenity).
column8: Full size bed in a quiet and comfortable home.
